body: I currently have a crappy mouse. I'm looking for a gaming mouse that is good and is in the $20-35 range. If you have any suggestions, please post them below.
body_tagged: I currently have a crappy mouse. I'm looking for a gaming mouse that is good and is in the $20-35 range. If you have any suggestions, please post them below.
title: Gaming Mouse

replies.body:
20-35$?...

I would spend more money for a 'Gaming' mouse.

75-100$ will be much better.
replies.body_tagged:
20-35$?...

I would spend more money for a 'Gaming' mouse.

75-100$ will be much better.

replies.body: No good gaming mouse is wireless. If you see a wireless gaming mouse turn, run, and don't look back. If you want a mouse that's even half worth it, save and get one for $60-100
replies.body_tagged: No good gaming mouse is wireless. If you see a wireless gaming mouse turn, run, and don't look back. If you want a mouse that's even half worth it, save and get one for $60-100

are the names!

replies.body: A wireless gaming mouse is not even worth it. If you were to go with a wired mouse I'd say that Steeleseries Rival is a good pick. I bought mine for 49 euros and it has definately payed back it's price. Also, the editing software works for both Windows and OS.
replies.body_tagged: A wireless gaming mouse is not even worth it. If you were to go with a wired mouse I'd say that Steeleseries Rival is a good pick. I bought mine for 49 euros and it has definately payed back it's price. Also, the editing software works for both Windows and OS.
